post:
Hello Everyone,

Today I bring you a 25% discount on all of our services, along with a special limited time only LET specific plan designed for all your hosting needs!

LOW-1 Plan:

2 GB of RAM<br>
50 GB Storage<br>
Unlimited Bandwidth Allowance<br>
1 IPV4 Address<br>
DDoS Protection<br>
£4.40 GBP Per Month ($7 USD approx.)

https://www.superior-networks.com/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=63

For a limited amount of time we are also offering 25% off all our servers for the first 2 months. To claim this you just need to type in the code TheLowEndTalk when you reach the checkout and it will be applied for you! You can see all of the plans that this offer applies to here: https://www.superior-networks.com/billing/cart.php?gid=16

The LOW-1 plan is specific to LowEndTalk and wont be seen anywhere else by us, we do also offer "Build Your Own" plans where you can custom build your server to the exact specifications you require, and if you cant find your exact match there we can organize it for you.

PayPal is our payment gateway of choice however should you wish to pay by Bank Transfer or Cheque we can arrange that for you. You just will need to open a support ticket with our accounting team who will direct you where to go!

For those wishing to test our servers we have the IP superior-networks.com. If you wish to download some test files or run some ping tests we have a looking glass that you can use at https://www.superior-networks.com/lg/ and is available for our French Location.

As these plans are seasonal plans they will probably be removed within the next 7-10 days. The coupon will run for as long as it is displayed at the top of our website, https://www.superior-networks.com

Have a great day,

Ryan
